adDetails: NEED HOUSECLEANING SERVICES? DISCOUNTS ON ALL APARTMENTS THIS WEEK ONLY We cover all of San Francisco and our service is 100% GUARANTEED. Don't lose this offer! We provide all supplies, regular or eco-friendly. You can check us out on Yelp.com: miros housecleaning. Call today for a free estimate at show contact info or email me at: show contact info. Feel free to ask for any extra requests. Our cleaning services include: Kitchen: Clean counter tops ; Load and run dishwasher; Clean inside of oven; Wipe cabinets; Wipe outside of appliances; Clean microwave inside/out ; Sweep and mop floor ; Clean inside of refrigerator; Wash sink; Take out trash . Bathroom(s): Clean and disinfect tub, toilet, shower, and sink; Clean mirrors; Sweep and mop floor; Change towels; wipe outside cabinets and doors; take out trash. Bedroom(s): Dust; Change sheets/ Make bed; Floors. Other Areas: Dust furniture, pictures; Wipe wood tables/chairs; Dust window blinds ; Vacuum/mop floors.
